questions.question: What is the primary color of the picture frame's visible exterior?

What is the overall shape of the picture frame?

How many visible tabs or clips secure the back of the frame?

What is the apparent orientation of the frame (portrait or landscape)?
Judging by the visible image, does the frame show any significant ornamentation?

Can you describe the apparent finish of the frame's exterior?

What is suggested by the visible size of the frame's inner opening?
